testcase.name: Successful login and logout
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I login with username "tomsmith" and password "SuperSecretPassword!"...passed Then I should see a success message.........................................passed When I logout...............................................................passed Then I should be back on the login page.....................................passed

testcase.name: Invalid login shows an error message - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I login with username "wrong" and password "SuperSecretPassword!"......passed Then I should see an error message..........................................passed

testcase.name: Invalid login shows an error message - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I login with username "tomsmith" and password "wrong"..................passed Then I should see an error message..........................................passed

testcase.name: Invalid login shows an error message - Example #1.3
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I login with username "wrong" and password "wrong".....................passed Then I should see an error message..........................................passed
